HelpText:
Supported commands are:

-merge,-m: merges together all the files in the input folder.
Example usage: -m D:\MyInputFolder D:\MyOutputFolder\MyOutputFile.txt

-delete,-d: delete all the files in the input folder based on the last time the file was used.
Example usage: -d D:\MyInputFolder 30

-help,-h: shows all the commands available and their usage.
